metadata.feature_description: Search posts by keywords, tags, and authors with advanced filtering options

steps.action: Navigate to Publisher module on News page
steps.actual: Publisher module loaded on News page with search box and author filter visible

steps.action: Enter 'Workflow' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Search results are filtered by keyword
steps.actual: Search returned 2 posts matching 'Workflow': 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing' and 'Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review'. URL updated to include ?text=Workflow

steps.action: Click on 'Test User2' in the Authors filter list
steps.expected: Posts are filtered to show only those by Test User2
steps.actual: Results filtered to 1 post by Test User2. URL updated to include &author=7. 'Viewing:' section shows active filter 'Test User2' with X to remove

steps.action: Click on 'News' breadcrumb link to clear filters
steps.expected: All filters are cleared and full post list is displayed
steps.actual: Navigated to clean News page without query parameters. Featured and Latest sections displayed with all posts visible
Search returned no results. Page displayed 'Your search returned no results' message

steps.action: Search for 'test & workflow' containing ampersand character
steps.expected: Special character is properly handled and search returns relevant results
steps.actual: Search successfully handled ampersand. URL properly encoded as ?text=test%20%26%20workflow. Returned 3 matching posts: Publisher Test Post, Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing, Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review

steps.action: With search 'test & workflow' active, click on 'Test User2' author filter
steps.expected: Results are filtered by both search term and author
steps.actual: Combined filters working correctly. URL shows both parameters: ?text=test%20%26%20workflow&author=7. Results narrowed to 1 post ('Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review') matching both criteria. 'Viewing:' section shows 'Test User2' active filter token

observations: Tags filter (TagsFilter.ascx) exists in code but was not visible in the current Publisher UI configuration. Only Authors filter was available on the sidebar.
Date range filter was not visible in the UI despite being mentioned in suggested test scenarios.
Pagination controls were not visible with the current data set (insufficient posts to trigger pagination).
Sorting options were not visible in the search results UI.
The search uses URL query parameters (text, author) which allows for bookmarkable/shareable filtered views.
Filter tokens display in 'Viewing:' section with X button for removal, providing clear indication of active filters.
